content.title: **[{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** streamlines the process of finding watermarks within business documents. Integrate our package into your {{EnvName}} applications to unlock its advantages.
content.step_1: To leverage our library features, load the {{FileformatCap}} file into a **Watermarker** class instance. You can provide a file path, file stream, or byte stream.
content.step_2: To refine the list of potential watermarks, use the **SearchCriteria object**. For instance, provide an image to find similar image watermarks. If finding textual watermarks, provide text, font, color, and other relevant options.
content.step_3: Use the **Search** method of the **Watermarker** object to retrieve watermarks placed within the document. You will receive a collection of objects representing potential watermarks for further processing.
content.step_4: Finally, you have the flexibility to manipulate the search results as needed. You can delete found watermarks or edit their properties, such as changing size or text.

more_features.title: Efficiently Search and Find Watermarks with {{ProdShortName}}
more_features.description: Harness the power of {{ProdShortName}} to search and locate watermarks in any document type using C# within {{EnvName}}.

feature_1.title: Discover Watermarks with Advanced Search
feature_1.content: Use {{ProdShortName}} to effortlessly find watermarks across multiple document types. Our tools allow you to search by parameters such as content, size, and opacity.

feature_2.title: Find Watermarks by Custom Parameters
feature_2.content: Tailor your search criteria with {{ProdShortName}} to locate watermarks based on specific properties, ensuring you can manage and review them effectively.

feature_3.title: Retrieve and Manage Watermarks Efficiently
feature_3.content: Streamline your document management process by quickly retrieving all watermarks in a document. Our API allows for rapid identification and analysis of watermarks.

code_1.title: C# Example: Search for Watermarks
code_1.content: This C# example demonstrates how to search for watermarks within any document using {{ProdShortName}}, illustrating how to utilize parameters for precise findings.
code_1.comment_1: Load the document from a local or networked source for processing
code_1.comment_2: Define the parameters for watermark search, such as type or visibility
code_1.comment_3: Retrieve all watermarks that match the specified criteria
code_1.comment_4: Review and manage the list of found watermarks to assess their impact
